page.title: 05A CROSS FISHERMAN
page.content: Mr.McArthur has been a fisherman for 8 years & he quite likes the job. He used to work at the{clams}in Skye with his{"forty-footer"}& only came home every 2 months, but then that boat sank. Now he works on a{75 foot {trawler}which works round Orkney & Shetland. The most successful type of fishing vessel is the{Seine netter.}It is also the kindest on the fish because they are only{trawled}for about{half an hour}at the most, but trawlers trawl them for{3 or 4 hours. The{price of fish}depends on the{time {of the year,}the{markets}& the {weather.}Sometimes{cod}brings the best price & sometimes it's{haddock.}Other Burness fishermen have{smaller boats and work with{creels}catching {"partans"}(crabs) &{lobsters,}which make a lot of money.
